job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Management Consulting,Information Technology and Services,Industrial Automation
job.description: This Jobot Job is hosted by Kyle Shaw  Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.  Salary $120,000 - $140,000 per year We are a consulting company that provides Data and AI solutions to large companies looking to automate their manufacturing capabilities. We work with fortune 500 businesses across industries and advise them on ways to improve product design and offer automation solutions.  We are looking for Data Science consultants interested in this type of work that enjoy fast-paced environments and solving complex Data and Business challenges. Candidates should have strong communication skills and have a wide arrange of Data Science experience. We are looking for engineers well-versed with various Machine Learning methodologies and tools who have experience collaborating and working with business verticals and presenting data cases to non-technical individuals.  This is a hybrid role in which candidates will travel to client sites 50% of the time and work remotely 50%. We offer a competitive base salary, great benefits package, and cover all travel expenses for our consultants! Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
